Texts.Chs: 456天--瓦格纳今天很兴奋地从挖掘场回来，看来他在挖掘冰层时发现了一些有趣的东西，我也希望它很有趣，要不然就太无趣了。
Texts.Eng: Day 456 - Wagner came back from the dig site very excited today. It seems he found something while digging for core samples in the ice. I await the specimen for study. It's likely nothing interesting.

Texts.Chs: 457天--尸检报告：外表不属于任何物种，我无法给它命名。检查中无法找到于已有资料符合的器官，无法理解其构成。
Texts.Eng: Day 457 - Autopsy Report: The specimen, which I cannot name at present, is not a match to anything I have ever before seen in my travels or studies. No terms produce results when searched. Whatever it is, its organs are quite different from ours. I can't even fathom their purpose.

Texts.Chs: 461天--我并不认为它已死亡，至少依照目前科研技术还无法精确地得出它已死亡的证据。所有已知伤害都无法抑制它体内细胞的再生。作为科学家，我竟然对这种生物产生了畏惧感。
Texts.Eng: Day 461 - I don't think it's dead. At least, not in any way I can quantify as likely. The cells regenerate far too fast to be anything less than miraculous, and no amount of damage seems to fully eradicate them. I'm in awe of this lifeform.

Texts.Chs: 462天--我并没有解剖那只狗，我想...是它...是它做的。从来没有过尸体还会复活的案例，但，这也证实了，它并未死去，它消失了，无影无踪，而且还学习了我对它解剖的手法将狗所解剖。我真的，真的希望它已经不在这所建筑物内。
Texts.Eng: Day 462 - I didn't do the thing they say I did. That dog wasn't from me. I think...it...did it. In any case, I can't locate the corpse. It vanished. Then it autopsied the dog like I did to it. I hope it left. I really, really do.

Texts.Chs: 469天--我已经被关在这里几天了，食物早已吃完，我想接下来我只能自噬了。当初实验留下的那些个细胞，谁也无法料到它竟会如此增殖，现在它犹如蠕虫般四处游走。除了再次把它冻结之外，我已想不出更好的办法了。
Texts.Eng: Day 469 - I've been locked in here for days now. Almost out of food. And I think I may be food myself fairly soon. The leftover specimen, a few cells at the time, is now moving around like some sort of freakish worm. It gets larger by the hour. I don't know what to do. The only thing left is to freeze it again.

Texts.Chs: 470天--我做到了，我把它给冻住了，接着瓦格纳终于探险回来了，但也带回了更多的...它。我已无力回天，我试图把这些事用纸记下来，我用的是西蒙斯的血，反正他已经感染了。
Texts.Eng: Day 470 - I'd frozen the specimen and all was well. And then Wagner returned from his expedition beyond the mountain. And he brought more of...them. There's nothing I can do now but try the wards I've been getting in my head. I'll need blood. Simmons will do. He's infected anyway.

Texts.Chs: 这份破烂不堪的报告被掩盖于这...东西之下
